data.description:
# Welcome to the MasterRunners Page.

MasterRunners is a free-to-play multiplayer hand based movement game surrounding a variety of entertaining gamemodes, cosmetics, obstacles, etc.

With over **9+ gamemodes** and an **active player count of 100,000+**, we guarantee this game is worth your time. We have lots to offer, so what are you waiting for!?

# What you can do:

- Play Gamemodes with players across the **WORLD**. MasterRunners can be played worldwide and with our **advanced multiplayer system**, you can enjoy multiplayer & have a very fun time. For the gamemodes, we build special gamemodes that have never been used in others games making us stand out and more fun.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/86601733_440204885645778_2463045873846786554_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=25Y-cREr57cQ7kNvgG0RZsn&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AuGWFOD7jWDhn2D5a8FXg-n&oh=00_AYANVB2ZPnvfsluJriheE3e7MMXJcaimbivtVCNrB_-vdA&oe=66E96B8E)
- Chill with friends and have a **great time.** With areas such as the "Main Hub", you can relax and have a calming time with buddies as you talk to your hearts desire.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982492_509486201534965_7333984808768808414_n.png?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=jADlTIWcV1sQ7kNvgGoqdAf&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AuGWFOD7jWDhn2D5a8FXg-n&oh=00_AYATqelUnKpHHlMi0XGoxPCFREb-KgNncGySh_Iehx5zvg&oe=66E95327)
- Shop for new cosmetics at Gregson's Shop with the free in-game currency... Energy! Using energy, you can get all kinds of cosmetics of any type just with one click. This is how you can customize your character!
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982613_1216230169384631_6163698231671476667_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Epg_OgkkscQQ7kNvgFoJyac&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AuGWFOD7jWDhn2D5a8FXg-n&oh=00_AYBMd2dS0bJ9Oxr3Kl66eDOmoIe-xryzcMZ_QlvnAv-GNg&oe=66E94B75)

- **Survive Monsters..**
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974658_770419331698632_3320560763268773557_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=iSgjoDIR9GUQ7kNvgFDQ07h&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AuGWFOD7jWDhn2D5a8FXg-n&oh=00_AYAVVK2KkaDw32SP9HTtmko9cVk19mvlT8MM3BEx7BltFw&oe=66E95967)

And more. 

There is lots to do in MasterRunners, so check it out **TODAY!**
![{"height":760,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036658_346841081692752_5615313403274744634_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ZBGh7DPP8SUQ7kNvgFj2nP-&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AuGWFOD7jWDhn2D5a8FXg-n&oh=00_AYCVDE5fNfE268K5K1Jxh-PGI8L1JnFG_FnydRJwoZ2T3A&oe=66E96808)
